name: Spinning Star
description:
How to play:

- Tap the screen to launch the planet
- Three and more adjacent planets will be destroyed
- Destroy the planet and rescue cute little stars
- Don't let the planets around the stars touch the edge of the screen
- The more stars rescued, the higher the score

Game Features:
- No level restrictions, you can play unlimited.
- Anytime, anywhere, no internet, easy and unlimited fun.

What are you waiting for? Slide your finger to save Little Star!
